extendedInfo.description: First Words First Sounds for Toddlers is the best way to teach your special little boy or girl new words. Featuring 100 different everyday words and objects in four different categories, the large colourful images make learning fun and exciting.Choose from * Animals* Transport* Food* At HomeEach word has a sound associated with it, and this is either the name of the picture, or the name of the picture plus a sound to go with it! Your child will soon learn to associate the different pictures with different words and sounds.Featuring a navigation system so simple even a toddler could use it! Either use the forward and backward buttons to go through the pictures, or swipe left or right. You can play the sounds by clicking on the sound icon, or tapping on the picture.Happy learning!
